TH7 Attack: DE Side attack with GiBam
Make these Troops: 12 Giants, 8 Wall Breakers, Barbarians 40%, Archers 60%, 15-20 Minions 1+ Heal Spell

column10: MAKE VECTOR FOR INITIAL ATTACK WITH FUNNEL, GIANTS, WALL BREAKERS, BARBARIANS AND ARCHERS...
vector for wall breaker front left
vector for wall breaker front right
launch giant (2 giant, one front left and one front right)
launch wall breaker (4 wall breaker, two front left and two front right)
Add a wait time; during wait time also CHECK exit values (exit if no resource left, exit if one or two starts reach)
MAKE VECTOR FOR FRONT SIDE ATTACK: GIANTS, WALL BREAKERS, BARBARIANS AND ARCHERS...
vector for wall breaker front left
vector for wall breaker front right
launch 10 giant        in 2 drop point (use drop point number 1,2) x 2 sides
launch 10 wall breaker in 2 drop point (use drop point number 1,2) x 2 sides
launch 10 barbarian    in 3 drop point (use drop point number 1,2,3) x 2 sides
launch 10 archers      in 3 drop point (use drop point number 1,2,3) x 2 sides
Add a wait time; during wait time also CHECK exit values (exit if no resource left, exit if one or two starts reach)
MAKE VECTOR TO LAUNCH THE SPELLS
Heal Spell at -8 tiles from redarea
Add a wait time; during wait time also CHECK exit values (exit if no resource left, exit if one or two starts reach)
MAKE VECTOR TO DEPLOY KING, QUEEN, G. WARDEN AND CASTLE
Add a wait time; during wait time also CHECK exit values (exit if no resource left, exit if one or two starts reach)
recalculate remaining troops and then launch...
MAKE VECTOR FOR ALL IN ATTACK...
launch remaining barbarian in 5 drop point (use drop point number 1,2,3,4,5) x 2 sides  - remaining barb
launch remaining archers   in 5 drop point (use drop point number 1,2,3,4,5) x 2 sides  - remaining arch
launch remaining goblins   in 5 drop point (use drop point number 1,2,3,4,5) x 2 sides  - remaining minions
launch remaining minions   in 4 drop point (use drop point number 7,8,9,10) x 2 sides   - remaining minions
